subject: Management
title: Conflict Debt
description: Learn Conflict Debt in one minute.

hook.text: A team had 14 unresolved disagreements. Every new discussion triggered three old ones.

buildup.text: Like technical debt, conflict debt accumulates when issues are deferred instead of resolved.

discovery.text: Each unresolved conflict makes the next one harder. Past grievances become ammunition.

twist.text: Teams don't blow up from one big fight. They collapse under the weight of many small ones.

climax.text: Schedule regular clearing conversations. Address small issues before they become structural.

punchline.text: Resolve conflicts early or pay compound interest later.

quiz.question: What is conflict debt?
options: The accumulation of unresolved issues that make future conflicts harder
The financial cost of hiring mediators for team disputes
A budgeting term for conflict resolution training expenses
